cards.title: Supporting people with chronic illnesses
cards.content: Our self-injecting drug delivery systems help people who battle medical issues every day with reclaiming the reins of their lives.

cards.title: Powering medical revolutions
cards.content: By helping starting and well-established pharmaceutical companies getting their product in the market, we support medical breakthroughs.

carousel2.title: In 2023 we made an inpact
carousel2.description: We only have two goals. We want to keep innovating for life. And we want to create the most sustainable device there is.

cards.subtitle: Tons of plastic saved
cards.content: We saved 480,000 tons of plastic by moving to a new manufacturing machine. That’s the weight of 24 elephants.

cards.subtitle: Liters of water saved
cards.content: 193,000 liters of water saved by using a sustainable dye for our products.

cards.subtitle: Manufacturing waste recycled
cards.content: 80% of our manufacturing waste is recycled.

cards.title: 10+ devs
cards.subtitle: Working on this project
cards.content: We have a team of 10+ developers working on this project. They are dedicated to making the world a better place.

cards.subtitle: Renewable energy
cards.content: We use 100% renewable energy to power our factories. This helps reduce our carbon footprint.

cards.subtitle: Trees planted
cards.content: We have planted 1,000,000 trees to help offset our carbon emissions. This is part of our commitment to sustainability.

cards.subtitle: Recyclable packaging
cards.content: All of our packaging is 100% recyclable. This helps reduce waste and protect the environment.

textMedia.title: We value our international work environment
textMedia.description: We value our international working environment. We are not set back by failures. We research our stuff because knowledge is power. And foremost, we care about people.
